title: 51. We Need to Go Beyond Basic: Tess' Favorite Classes for Outside Esthetics Education.
description:
Hi Roomies! Enjoy this solo episode with Tess highlighting her favorite esthetics courses to take outside of school! Some classes are free or virtual so there's no reason NOT to continue learning while quarantined. We hope it helps you to go beyond the basic education provided in school. I hope everyone is doing as amazing as they can be in quarantine. I know it can be difficult if you are in esthetician school to stay motivated, keep your eye on the prize and continue to learn. I hope this information is the encouragement you need to keep pushing yourself forward! 

Huge thanks to the sponsors of this episode!

Explore sponsorship opportunities and start monetizing your podcast by signing up here: https://podcorn.com/podcasters/

Learn more about how Fastic app can address your health goals: https://fastic.com/en/home/

CLASSES MENTIONED

Skincare Ingredient Knowledge 

Chemical peels

Lymphatic Drainage

Advanced Acne

https://conceptsinstitute.com/course-category/online-courses/


Advanced Acne

Douglas Preston for reference (does not teach the class any longer but he has lots of helpful acne resources and sells his tool online): https://www.prestonskincenter.com/ 

Michelle at Concepts Institute offers a class

https://conceptsinstitute.com/course-category/online-courses/


How to Eliminate Hyperpigmentation Quickly and Effectively When Treating Multicultural Skin

Private Label Skincare Course

Client Retention

https://www.joelleskincare.com/esthetics-training


Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa.dermaplus

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd 

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
